system.description: You are skilled at fighting with two weapons.
system.prerequisites: Dex 17, Two-Weapon Fighting, base attack bonus +6
system.benefit: In addition to the standard single extra attack you get with an off-hand weapon, you get a second attack with it, albeit at a -5 penalty.
system.special: A fighter may select Improved Two-Weapon Fighting as one of his fighter bonus feats.
